price: Ɔno na Ɔbͻͻ onipa fri nsuo mu, εna Wayε mogya-abusua ne awadeε-abusua ama no. Wo Wura Nyankopͻn ne Otumfoͻ a Otumi ade nyinaa yε.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ بَشَرٗا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبٗا وَصِهۡرٗاۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī khalaqa mina al-māi basharan fajaʿalahu nasaban waṣih'ran wakāna rabbuka qadīran
